title: Trump rolls back fuel efficiency standards
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced he'll roll back Biden-era fuel economy standards, saying the change will save Americans money.

title: More GOP infighting as key Trump ally attacks Speaker Johnson
shortDescription: Elise Stefanik, a GOP candidate for New York governor, told the Wall Street Journal that House Republicans have underperformed under Mike Johnson.

title: Embattled lawmaker to run for reelection after Trump pardon
shortDescription: Trump issued a pardon for Cuellar, who was indicted on counts of bribery, conspiracy and money laundering.

title: Trump resets fuel economy standards for vehicles
shortDescription: Signed into law in 1975, the Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) standards regulate how far vehicles must travel on a gallon of fuel.

title: ¿Cómo funcionan las Cuentas Trump? Ahorro infantil comienza con $1,000
shortDescription: Las Cuentas Trump ofrecen $1,000 por bebé nacido entre 2025 y 2028, más $250 extra. Descubre cómo funcionan, cómo reclamarlas y si convienen.

title: Trump administration pauses immigration applications for 19 nations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration has paused immigration applications from 19 countries after two National Guard members were shot on Nov. 26.

title: Key takeaways as Dems overperform in red Tennessee race despite loss
shortDescription: While Republicans can breathe a sigh of relief for averting a disaster, Tennessee's 7th congressional election provided warnings signs for 2026.

title: Tariff dividend checks discussed by Trump during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump discusses tariff dividend checks during a cabinet meeting.

title: How do 'Trump accounts' for kids work? See benefits, eligibility
shortDescription: The accounts act as individual retirement accounts or IRAs, for children born during Trump's second term.

title: Who won the Tennessee race for state’s 7th Congressional District?
shortDescription: Who won the race for state’s 7th Congressional District? Here are the Tennessee's special election results

title: Eyes closed, nation watching: Trump’s mid-meeting snooze sparks buzz
shortDescription: Photos show President Trump appearing to nod off during a Cabinet meeting on Dec. 2.

title: Was Trump sleeping at the Cabinet meeting? Watch the video
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a Cabinet meeting on Dec. 2, where footage shows him closing his eyes for long periods of time. Was he sleeping?

title: Tennessee sends 'warning signs' of blue wave for Trump and the GOP
shortDescription: Democratic party leaders are sounding increasingly optimistic about 2026, while Republicans are the ones expressing concerns of a midterm wipeout.

title: Trump appears to doze off during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: Donald Trump's eyes were very heavy during a three-hour long cabinet meeting. Press Sec. Karoline Leavitt said he was "listening attentively."

title: Trump pardons Congressman Henry Cuellar
shortDescription: Henry Cuellar, D-Texas, won an 11th term in November despite facing a federal indictment over charges that he took foreign bribes.

title: Trump freezes immigration from 19 nations
shortDescription: The Trump administration paused green cards, citizenship and visa processing for 19 countries already under a travel ban.

title: Photos show President Trump appearing to doze off in Cabinet meeting
shortDescription: New photos show President Donald Trump appearing to doze off at a Cabinet meeting this week.

title: Trump blasts Somalis as 'garbage' but local officials defend refugees
shortDescription: Trump blasted Somali immigrants as 'garbage' he doesn't want in the country. But Minnesota officials called the criticism 'racism' and 'un-American.'

title: White House rejects claims trump was dozing off during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump faced accusations of dozing off during a cabinet meeting on Tuesday, December 2, after footage showed him with his eyes closed

title: Jared Isaacman, Trump's NASA pick, faces Senate today. How to watch
shortDescription: Jared Isaacman will appear today for a Senate hearing ahead of a potential confirmation vote for him to become NASA's next administrator.
